entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries. Flurries at times heavy beginning late this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 20 March 2023
